name: build-inspector
description: A simple extension that demonstrates how to show details for a Visual Studio Team Services resource.

scripts.build: tsc -p . && ncp ./node_modules/vss-web-extension-sdk/lib ./dist/lib && ncp ./launch.html ./dist/launch.html && ncp ./items.html ./dist/items.html && ncp ./css ./dist/css && ncp ./images ./dist/images

author: Microsoft
